name: Chrono Rifter
description:
A game made for the 7th KluJam. The theme was "#TogetherApart" and the game was made within 48h. Due to several problems with Unity Collab, the game is not near to being final and is considered a protoype.

The game was planned to be an online multiplayer where two players are in the same world but on different timelines. The players are linked through time and have to stay close to eachother to survive. Both would see the same enemies, but not eachother. 

The goal is to survive as long as possible against the oncoming waves of enemies.

How to Play
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • R to reload
